entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
